attributes.action: arrange for the national anthem to be changed to The Flumps theme tune
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We wish to replace God Save the Queen with a more apposite, modern, forward-thinking tune and believe The Flumps' theme tune to be just that.

Everyone can hum it. It says "Britain!" out loud and clear to everyone and would be distinct and novel compared the the many other national anthems around the world.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
